name: Valhalla Match 3 - Might And Magic Match 3 Game
name_original: Valhalla Match 3 - Might And Magic Match 3 Game
description:
Valhalla Match 3 - Might And Magic Match 3 Game is a unique game based on well known concept of Match 3 type game, based in a dark fantasy world with role-playing atmosphere.

You're a Valhalla Knight, which goes on a long and dangerous journey, through 5 worlds, filled with mystery, dungeons, dragons, basilisks, potions, magic, dragons and other fantasy creatures.

If you want to try something different, then Valhalla Match 3 might be for you.

Features:
- 5 worlds: Cursed Forest, Hidden Stone Valley, Abandoned Giants House, Dragons Liar, House Of Forgotten Valhalla Kings.
- 100 unique and challenging levels
- boosters in form of potions, magic wands and magic bombs
- different kinds of challenges. Some time based, other with limited number of steps
- items such as tainted heart, spell books, axes, knight shield, mags daggers, etc
- unique atmospheric fantasy graphics
- addictive game play in a strange world of magic
- Valhalla Match 3 - Might And Magic Match 3 Game is totally Free game


How to Play:
- Move and match 3 or more magic items of the same type to destroy and win points
- Collect special artifacts
- Boost your experience with wondrous spells and potions
- Reach high scores and try to get 3 stars on each level
